item.title: Useful blog posts that I might want to read it again | Writer Diary
item.description: ReactJs Common Beginner Mistakes with React | https://www.joshwcomeau.com/react/common-beginner-mistakes/ Common Beginner Mistakes with React | https://www.joshwcomeau.com/react/common-beginner-mistakes/ SOLID principles in ReactJs | https://blog.devgenius.io/solid-principles-in-reactjs-1d225dd22a3f Ultimate React Router v6 Guide | https://blog.webdevsimplified.com/2022-07/react-router/ Typescript The Difference between TypeScript and Javascript | https://fjolt.com/article/typescript-difference-between-typescript-javascript 11 Tips That Make You a Better Typescript Programmer | https://dev.to/zenstack/11-tips-that-help-you-become-a-better-typescript-programmer-4ca1 Understanding infer in TypeScript | https://blog.logrocket.com/understanding-infer-typescript/ Utilities YOU MIGHT NOT NEED DATE-FNS | https://youmightnotneed.com/date-fns
